title: Is a human being also a human person? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not always, no Are all humans persons? No. Are all persons human? We have yet to find out, but if theists are to be believed: no, because gods are persons. “Wait, what do you mean that not all humans are persons?” Because personhood is a legal concept. You are not granted personhood as soon as your genetic code is assembled, but you actually have time to grow for a while. This is a difficult question, and different jurisdictions around the world have different ways of looking at this. For more information, see: Beginning of human personhood - Wikipedia
